hero.mainHeading: Where the digital world meets the real world

features.description: A platform that combines social media with e-commerce offering OmniStore ® that connects offline retailers with digitally driven offline customers.

safePlace.title: Safe Place
safePlace.description: To share your life with friends and family without being attacked for who you are.

neutral.title: Neutral
neutral.description: Like Switzerland, we take no sides and with zero tolerance for hate, bullying, & discrimination.

connected.title: Connected
connected.description: Your feed doesn't just show people, It shows what your local stores sell, bringing your online life closer to your real world.

socialize.heading: Socialise, Share your life, Shop, & Sell all in one place

localLife.title: A space where your local life goes digital
localLife.description: Follow nearby brands and stores, discover new products, and support your local businesses, all in one social feed.

growBusiness.title: Grow your business, expand your reach
growBusiness.description: Build a community around your brand, or start your entrepreneurial journey right here on Vesko.

omnistore.title: OmniStore ®
omnistore.subtitle: For brick-and-mortar retailers
omnistore.description: Transform your physical store into a virtual showroom. Sell from the same inventory both online and offline, and connect with digitally-driven walk-in customers.

onlineStore.title: Online Store
onlineStore.subtitle: For Online vendors
onlineStore.description: For digital-first vendors. Build your brand, grow a loyal customer base, and connect directly with your audience, all within a supportive, social commerce platform.

featuresGrid.heading: Powerful Features
featuresGrid.subtitle: Discover how our platform revolutionizes the way you do business

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Safe and secure checkout, powered by end-to-end encryption and trusted payment partners.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: Fast and reliable delivery with pre-set logistics integrations making order fulfillment seamless for both vendors and customers.

unboxing.heading: See it yourself!
unboxing.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

reviews.heading: Trusted By Industry Leaders
reviews.subtitle: Read feedback and reviews from future customers and users who have tested Vesko

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.content: Vesko has transformed how we handle our digital presence. The platform's innovative approach to connecting vendors and customers is truly revolutionary.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.content: The seamless integration of payment and logistics features has streamlined our entire operation. It's exactly what we needed.

reviews.name: Mike Johnson
reviews.content: As a logistics provider, I'm impressed by how Vesko has simplified the complex process of order fulfillment.

waitlist.title: Join our users waitlist
waitlist.successMessage: Thank you for joining our waitlist!
waitlist.successSubtitle: We'll notify you as soon as we launch.
waitlist.errorMessage: Please enter a valid email address

merchant.title: Merchant? Register and get early bird package offer

items.item1: It's a social media app with online stores where you can shop or even sell.
items.item2: You can follow friends, people, stores, and brands.
items.item3: A home feed where you'll see posts from people you follow and
items.item4: Product posts from your favourite stores and brands that you can buy directly.

secondSection.subText: But it's not the same toxic space you're used to
